akn:section.akn:heading: Abatement of real property taxes for 2 M Street, N.E.

akn:content.akn:p: Beginning October 1, 2014, the tax imposed by Chapter 8 of this title on the real property described as Lot 258, Square 672, and any improvements thereon, shall be abated for 10 years; provided, that:

The owner of the real property shall certify to the Office of Tax and Revenue that the projectâ€™s application for mortgage insurance has been approved and shall inform the Office of Tax and Revenue if approval has been withheld.
